website_summaries.verdict: Discrete graphics, an unusual screen aspect ratio, and a tempting price make Huawei's MateBook 13 ultraportable worth a look for traveling execs or even light gamers.
cons: Core i7 config has 8GB, not 16GB, of memory

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: The listing is completely wrong saying its touch screen and it comes with a portable quick charger it dosnt and iv had the item 2 days now used the first day fine second day the battery went from 100 cos I charged it to 60 in a hour or so I will be returning this item and buying from a different seller miss sold in the description should of red there reviews which are terrible
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I do not have the version with a touchscreen, but that does not bother me one bit. This is an absolutely an amazing little machine. Very, very impressed, the battery life could be better, but for my purposes, no problem at all. If you are in the market for a small but quite powerful laptop and do not consider this Huawei Matebook 13 then you are making a big, big mistake. Very highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Johnno

customer_reviews.title: Not really for gaming fans loud
customer_reviews.text: It's decent, it's fast and snappy, fingerprint sensor is excellent, mx250 will play games but they aren't really enjoyable as the fans crank up and you have to play on very low settings on pub g lite and forty, it's also noisey as hell. Also the fans often turn up for seemingly no good reason, so that annoyed me.
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop under £1000
customer_reviews.text: The best laptop under £1000! Beautiful display and small bezels, pretty good battery life around 8/9h with a medium usage and very fast, I've got the i7 version and it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan

customer_reviews.title: NO TOUCHSCREEN!!!! MISSELLING / FALSE ADVERTISING BY MANUFACTURER!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Matebook 13 2019 arrived yesterday (late!) and it DOES NOT HAVE A TOUCHSCREEN!, despite being advertised as such. DONT BE RIPPED OFF! THE MANUFACTURER IS MISELLING!
customer_reviews.author: basscadet

customer_reviews.title: ADVERTISED AS HAVING TOUCH SCREEN IT DOESN'T HAVE
customer_reviews.text: There is no touch screen. Sold as having one. There isn't one. Other than that which 9/10 is a deal breaker the laptop is great, lightweight, great keyboard, handles tasks really quickly, incredible screen. NO TOUCH SCREEN THOUGH.
customer_reviews.author: sebastianjbreaks

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Fan Noise and Overheating!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a laptop you can use in meetings please do not buy this laptop. After a few minutes of using it, the fan noise is just too loud even when using a simple application like word or excel. From day one the laptop was also overheating. This was not resolved even after contacting the amazon support team. A very disappointed customer. Apart from those very disappointing features, the laptop is very sleek and light with great speakers. So sad i cannot be able to use it at work due to the fan noise.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: No touch scree as advertised
customer_reviews.text: this laptop does not have a touch scree as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: System Testing

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how many laptops I've had over the years, probably dozens. This is the best by far. Outstanding build quality. Sensational performance. Great fingerprint integration into the power button for one press login. I am so chuffed. I've purchased a USB-C Dock with charging integration for my USB peripherals (keyboard, mouse and headset) and a USB-C to Displayport cable to drive my 32" screen and it is a near perfect setup.
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneElse

customer_reviews.title: 2020 Model review
customer_reviews.text: The latest version of this model. Minor, but worthwhile improvements. The i5 model which I have includes the Nvidia MX250 Graphics with the latest Intel processor. Well made product and does everything I need it for. Battery life seems better than earlier models. The drive is partitioned and in my view, the system C (Windows) partition is too small. This can easily be extended before any data is put on the other D (data) partition. I cannot really criticise this laptop for anything other than the higher price.
customer_reviews.author: MikeP

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is great, it’s fast and snappy but it’s biggest weakness is the display. It looks great, it’s bright enough but as soon as you put black background on it the terrible backlight bleed shows and it’s quite annoying. Build quality it’s good, definitely not perfect, there is a few squeaks here and there and especially around the display, which to my taste it’s not rigid enough and you can see colours shifting as you move it or open and close the lid. For this price would definitely want to see a unibody design as this is more expensive that a MacBook Air and only slightly cheaper than a MacBook Pro in base configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian D.

customer_reviews.title: No touch screen.
customer_reviews.text: Despite advertising matebook 13 on their website as having touchscreen, all the ones they're selling in the UK do not have touch screen. I have bought 3 from different resellers and huawei themselves and there is no touch screen, I've returned them all.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A Dow

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of different reviews for laptops before I bought this. I wasn't happy about the Monitoring application but removing it was simple. Great screen, good performance. I'm never a fan of track pads, preferring a mouse, so having the USB attachment to give USB-C, USB-2, VGA and HDMI ports was really convenient. Battery life hasn't been a problem so far though it is a little noisy but I tune it out easily enough (i always use a monitor hooked up to the laptop so it's well off to the side of my work place). No regrets so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is very good, gives a good sturdy build and quality look. It's lightweight and easy to carry around - the weight is just about right. It does not get hot at all and does a great job for basic stuff like watching youtube, surfing the web, a few documents. The graphics card is also suitable for some light gaming but I haven't tried any. The battery lasts about 4-5 hours, not the greatest but still works fine. It did get very hot when first installing update but for anyone concerned about thermals it is only hot during the first updates. Next day it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vasil Dzhakov

customer_reviews.title: Feels Premium
customer_reviews.text: The hardware on this laptop feels really good and overall it does perform very well. The battery life isn't brilliant, usually only lasts a few hours but it does charge quickly. The base gets very hot so if you want to use this on your lap or other uneven surfaces you'll probably need to get a cooling mat to go under it. The screen isn't touchscreen either despite what the listing says.
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a highly rated laptop with ‘Which’s ’ testing, and thus started our purchase ... it stopped there. Our first turned up damaged then the second arrived already infected with a virus 🙄🙄😐 After credits received... which took too long under our consumer rights, we opted for a Microsoft product.. more money but does just the job.. also rated highly again with Which’s testing .
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT TOUCHSCREEN!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it DOES NOT have touch screen! I have contacted the Amazon customer service twice about this and they said they will correct the description, which is very misleading. I can see that this has still not happened. To be fair they were very polite and did offer me to return the product but I was in desperate need for a work laptop so had to keep it. Battery life and display quality are great but the sound is veeery low. Even on top volume and without any background noises in the room I am struggling to hear people on meetings. You definitely need either a headset or external speakers with it. Very disappointed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maroula Eleni Natsi

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: What a laptop. I had been back and forward with a getting a new laptop for months and then finally took the dive when this beauty got discounted and I must say I am glad I did. The build quality is amazing, the screen is perfect and crisp and bright enough for me. The performance is top notch and I havent noticed a single slow down or stutter since I got it. Highly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Heaney

customer_reviews.title: All in all a very good alternative for more expensive items. Little but strong
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Very nice all around. The battery will last depending on what you throw at it. Video editing less battery time just watching movies or Internet browsing very good battery life. Very fast booting up for system. Very good for most of the games. Great keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop for the money, ryzn CPU works well, very snappy in every day use, Ms Office and browsing, YouTube 4k runs without issues
customer_reviews.author: Gulam

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect if you have a WiFi router in every room of your house, but seriously the WiFi chip in this otherwise good laptop is terrible. You will continually have issues staying connected to any network unless you sit directly in front of the router. Continually having to disconnect/reconnect the WiFi every 5 minutes is aggravating at best. After less than 2 weeks the charger has broken.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality, dead after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Laptop has died after 5 weeks. Turns on for 1 second and then turns off, think something on the motherboard is dead.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. W. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is great. It is quiet and runs very well. I've been playing the Sims 4 on it with some high settings and it's completely lag free. Browsing is quick and simple word processing work is also quick. I've had it for about 6 weeks and it has kept the battery life and the speed. The screen is very good quality with some lovely bright colours. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptops, wanted to buy more for employees but can't find anywhere in the UK?
customer_reviews.text: Love my laptop! Using for work email, docs and presenting. Light, good screen and battery is great. I wanted to buy another 3 for employees but have since seen the Matebooks are not available anywhere in the UK? Are these now banned in the UK?
customer_reviews.author: Dan Richards

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality the best lap top I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb machine. Fires up instantly and is very fast. Set ups is simple (even for a 75 year old granny) It is sturdy, compact and very stylish. I could not be more delighted. My granddaughter who is an Apple iPod fan is very impressed with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop. Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Very good laptop. Fast and powerful enough for my needs. I use it for software development. Visual Studio works well on it. I have also used it for watching videos. Speakers are not fantastic but also no bad, more than adequate at this price point. Small and light but good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Amazing build quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance, not any difference to the i5 model. Very good build quality like apple mac
customer_reviews.author: S. Alimmarvasti

customer_reviews.title: Good  Laptop for Work and general use.
customer_reviews.text: Good, easy to use laptop for working. I have it linked up to 3 monitors and a wireless keyboard to replace my desktop it does the job really quite well. The Processor is nice and powerful so I can keep all my case studies and reports open at the same time while working on them.
customer_reviews.author: James Andrew Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: great  light laptop
customer_reviews.text: enough battery power to get through the day, small and compact with enough power to do all the normal tasks of a mid range laptop, can't fault it to be honest will probably buy another for a family member soon
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and has decent video power
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is pure quality looks like that famous other brand of laptop but half the price. It has a beautiful scren, powers in in under 5 second's. I can even play games on this!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: A really good laptop. Easy to setup and use. Good battery life. Excellent graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Foster

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these laptops on Amazon's Prime Sale and I'm not regretting it one bit! Easy set up, lightweight and battery lasts for ages. Bright screen, and very good value for money considering the specs.
customer_reviews.author: Helder A.

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of kit! But...
customer_reviews.text: It was a very nice notebook, unfortunately it failed to start back up one day and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent except for the screen
customer_reviews.text: Such a brilliant laptop in so many ways (the battery life is outstanding) utterly ruined and let down by the poor screeen. Ended up returning it :(
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very light, feels well put together, excellent screen and the spec for the money raised it head and shoulders above other kit in its category.
customer_reviews.author: Paully

customer_reviews.title: Solid and fast laptop
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and when travelling. Really solid and fast computer
customer_reviews.author: Mawd

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back as audio was awful when using Microsoft teams, otherwise good in any other aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Parvis Tafreshi

customer_reviews.title: excelent computer
customer_reviews.text: Huawei matebook d ryzen 14 proved to be an extraordinary pc, excellent screen image, very good execution speed and huge hard battery. The only repair is that it warms up a bit, but nothing too much. I recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight laptop. Fast start up and great screen. Battery life is super
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great small laptop
customer_reviews.text: Use this a lot more than I thought I would, it has a super fast boot time and just high quality all over. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: UK.KV

customer_reviews.title: Great super fast laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love the compact design and processing speed. Only having the two USC connectors is a bit of an issue as you end up with a christmas tree of adapters hanging out the side.
customer_reviews.author: John Newton

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Mid range specs. Good quality screen. A bit thicker and heavier than a 13 inch Mac. But a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good looking compact laptop
customer_reviews.text: i like the light weight, screen and overall performance..Also easy to upgrade the SDD. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Huawei The Lads
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of kit, worth every penny, looks the biz as well. Love it
customer_reviews.author: JRP

customer_reviews.title: Premium laptop
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this laptop feels premium including spec, someone left negative feedback about hinges, this laptop doesn't have any. I have had no doubts about the quality as I own huawei p20 pro.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Kruszynski

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. Its stylish. It's quick. Battery life is great. I'm a student and a business manager and it runs perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Miss NJ Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: Quick & easy to use - teacher so need a good laptop
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: best laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, really good battery, and speed of loading and changing pages, excellent laptop, would recommend as not too expensive for this quality.
customer_reviews.author: carley marshall

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great Laptop - exceeded my expectations - happy with it. Mr. R.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great computer! The best I have ever had. Wonderful speed, and good value for money paid.
customer_reviews.author: S A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 weeks and Huawei were really slow at organizing a replacement
customer_reviews.author: alexwc1995

customer_reviews.title: not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an apple Mac rip-off I was given one of these with a broken hinge very slow from the box Full of bloatware and spy ware not recommended More Chinese rubbish
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Battery not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought a brand new Matebook 13 last month. The advertised battery was 9-11 hours even with video. The reality was I get 4-4.5 hours from basic word processing, and no video and sound outputs! But if you call up to make a complaint, please understand they are heavily scripted and won't help you in any way shape or form. Be warned, they are the RyanAir of tech companies! My 5 year old Macbook was giving me more battery. Wish I never gave them my money. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware - different model advertised online and huawei not clarifying the errros
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware - deceptive description huawei sell few different versions of this laptop. 2019 2020 intel and amd versions. what they don't advertise in any of their websites or specifications list, is that some of the models aren't touchscreen and some don't have dedicated graphics mx150 or. mx250 but integrated only. the misleading specifications online deliberately omit mentioning all this differences. booo huawei, booooo. forget usa, you just lost a lifelong customer. I hate companies who try to swindle their customers through such tricks. booooooooooooo
customer_reviews.author: articoceanic

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy
customer_reviews.text: I got ryzen 5 2020 model Don't know from where to start, screen bleeding, very bed if not the worst speakers on a portable device I ever heard. Very buzzy, not clear and like there is something loose in it. Screen bleeding so so bad and WiFi card is just horrible. Latency is unbearable. I thought I got a faulty unit then I packed and I returned. After one month (dpd) can not deliver for two whole weeks I got the new unit with missing C to USB cable and same rubbish unit.
customer_reviews.author: Nacicomuskaka

customer_reviews.title: Warranty will not be honoured with screen damage!
customer_reviews.text: No real complaints about the laptop itself but be warned that the screen can crack if you open the lid too quickly. Someone at Huawei tech support informed me that they outright refuse to repair any damage from opening or closing the lid because this "doesn't fit under the terms of normal laptop use". The assistant said they see a lot of this sort of damage and head office always refuse to honour the warranty. It seems that there is a serious design flaw with the edge of the screen getting caught on the body of the laptop due to too much flex. this repair will cost you around 300 quid so consider that extra cost when choosing this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Andrew R E Charlewood

customer_reviews.title: Like MacBook Pro for Windows
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2017 MBP, which is very nice and very fast. However, I don't think much of the keyboard and I need to run mostly Windows software for work. The Matebook D 14 is very similar in build quality and speed to the MBP, but with a better keyboard and lovely big matte screen. The Ryzen 5 is very quick and I'm seeing battery life from 6-8 hours. It runs all of my MS programmes brilliantly, but unable to comment on its suitability for photo/video editing or gaming.
customer_reviews.author: boslon

product_meta.title: HUAWEI MateBook 13 2019 - Ultra Laptop with 2K FullView - Intel Core i5 8 GB RAM 512 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce MX250 Windows 10 Home Dolby Atom Speakers Grey
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Grey| Size Name:(2019 model)i5, 8+512 GB| Style Name:Matebook 13 2019HUAWEI MateBook 13 features 2K FullView Screen with an 88% screen-to-body ratio and the slender 4.4mm bezel. This laptop from HUAWEI powered by Intel Core i5 8265U processor and runs on Windows 10 Home OS. It houses Dolby Atom Sound System dual speakers to bring you immersive audio experience, and builds with the fingerprint recognition home buttom to let you get access to your laptop instantly. While the 41.7 Wh (TYP) battery capacity with fast charging technology and the storage of 8 GB of RAM and 256 GB of SSD will power your daily use efficiently.
feature_bullets: 13 Inch 2K Fullview Screen: HUAWEI FullView Display delivers more than an impressive screen, it brings to life a fully immersive visual experience; with an 88 Percent screen-to-body ratio, the HUAWEI MateBook 13's slender 4.4 mm bezel makes more room for bright, rich and vivid graphics to ignite your imagination

Powerful Performance: The ultra-slim body carries NVIDIA GeForce MX250 with 2 GB GDDR5. Get up to 3.5X performance over integrated graphics for image processing and video editing (Data from NVIDIA); featuring the 8th generation (Whiskey Lake) Intel coreTM i5 8265U processor, in terms of power and longevity, it's a game changer for laptop technology

Body and Soul: Lightweight yet robust, the HUAWEI MateBook 13 is designed for optimal portability; its slim line 14.9 mm metallic frame is meticulously crafted with a diamond cut finish on each corner, giving it an ultra-modern premium look and feel; a powerfully elegant machine

Multi-screen Collaboration: With just a simple tap, your smartphone and Huawei MateBook will transform into one super device even without Internet connection; your phone screen appears on your laptop which allows you to drag and drop files between them and edit the files on your laptop while messaging colleagues on your phone using the same keyboard and mouse; *The HUAWEI MateBook 13 has to have PC Manager 10.0 or above installed (with relative drivers); This function is only compatible with specific NFC-enabled HUAWEI or HONOR smartphones running EMUI10 (or Magic UI 3.0) or above

Rapid Heat Dissipation: HUAWEI’s Shark Fin 2.0 fan design can dissipate heat faster than ever by using dual fans; the 25 Percent speed increase of normal fans enhances air flow to cool the computer rapidly and quietly for a better working experience (Data Based on results from HUAWEI lab tests)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
